about_the_game:
Trapped inside the room full of screens.

A pair of hands who can predict your future.

Ask a question and draw the runes, they will unveil the forthcoming.


This is the future you'll live in.
A small world, a city.
Full of uncertainty and doubt, violence and obsession.

In a time of despair, they'll have nothing to trust.
They'll come, they'll seek.

DIVINATION.

It will answer every question.
The secret inside one's heart;
The fortune for tomorrow;
The fate of the loved one;
The meaning of life;
Everything.

You are the Diviner.
The runes have been set, show them the answer.

DIVINATION

A short game where you act as a fortune teller in a futuristic world. Talk and listen to people's stories, then foresee their future using the runes they had drawn. The result of your divination will stir the fate of humans and robots alike.




FEATURES


  • 4 different clients in all different kinds of story, flesh, and mind.
  • Rune reading mechanic.
  • Multiple endings based on the outcomes of your divination.
  • Flowchart divination to ease player experience.
  • Ominous ethno-futuristic soundtrack.

content_descriptors.notes: themes of self-harm and suicidal ideation

reviews:
“It’s a potent meditation on the value of life, and how much or how little agency people are given to choose how or whether they live. Is life satisfying or meaningful if you can’t change your role?”
Emily Rose - RE:BIND
short_description: "What if you're born into this world without your permission?" DIVINATION is a very short visual novel where you act as a fortune teller in a futuristic world. Talk and listen to people's stories, then foresee their future using the runes they had drawn.
